panels.description: *Core Functionality - Critical & High importance test cases of Critical and High priority requirements.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, passed, xpass, skip, blocked, failed, xfailed, error, manual
FROM req_portal
WHERE env='$env' AND avg='core-1' AND plugin='$plugin_name' ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Core Functionality, 24-hour avg [$env]

panels.description: It's a historical representation of the 24 hr core avg.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time, passed, xpass, skip, blocked, failed, xfailed, error, manual
FROM req_portal
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND env='$env' AND avg='core-1' AND plugin='$plugin_name' ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Core 24 Hour avg historical data [$env]

panels.description: *Core Functionality - Critical & High importance test cases of Critical and High priority requirements

targets.rawSql:

panels.description: It's a historical representation of the 7-day core avg. Data points represent the 7-day average at that respective time.

panels.title: Overall 7-day avg historical data [$env]

panels.description: Make sure 7 days of data available

targets.rawSql:
SELECT l.total_tests - f.total_tests AS "New Tests", l.automated - f.automated AS "Automated", l.not_automated - f.not_automated AS "Non-Automated", l.manual_only - f.manual_only AS "Manual-Only" FROM 
(SELECT total_tests, automated, not_automated, manual_only FROM tests WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND time > current_date - interval '7 days' ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 1) f,
(SELECT total_tests, automated, not_automated, manual_only FROM tests WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND time > current_date - interval '7 days' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) l

panels.title: Last 7 Days

panels.description: Make sure 15 days of data available

targets.rawSql:
SELECT l.total_tests - f.total_tests AS "New Tests", l.automated - f.automated AS "Automated", l.not_automated - f.not_automated AS "Non-Automated", l.manual_only - f.manual_only AS "Manual-Only" FROM 
(SELECT total_tests, automated, not_automated, manual_only FROM tests WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND time > current_date - interval '15 days' ORDER BY time ASC LIMIT 1) f,
(SELECT total_tests, automated, not_automated, manual_only FROM tests WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND time > current_date - interval '15 days' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) l

panels.title: Last 15 Days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT time AS "time", automated, not_automated, manual_only
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", automated, not_automated, manual_only
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", critical, high, medium, low
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", critical, high, medium, low
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", ui, non_ui
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", ui, non_ui
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", functional, non_functional
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT time AS "time", functional, non_functional
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

WITH json_data AS (
    SELECT
        assignees::jsonb AS assignee_count
    FROM tests
    WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
    LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
    jsonb_object_keys(assignee_count) AS "Assignee",
    (assignee_count ->> jsonb_object_keys(assignee_count))::integer AS "Tests Count"
FROM json_data;

SELECT time AS "time", negative
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", customer_scenario
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")

SELECT time AS "time", missing_assignee, missing_automation_status, missing_component, missing_importance, missing_interface_type, missing_requirements, missing_type
FROM tests
WHERE repository_id=$test_repository_id AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT cloc.time AS "time", cloc.cloc, repositories.name FROM cloc INNER JOIN repositories ON cloc.repository_id=repositories.id
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT cloc.time AS "time", cloc.cloc, repositories.name FROM cloc INNER JOIN repositories ON cloc.repository_id=repositories.id
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT codecoverage.time AS "time", codecoverage.coverage, repositories.name
FROM codecoverage INNER JOIN repositories ON codecoverage.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT codecoverage.time AS "time", codecoverage.coverage, repositories.name
FROM codecoverage INNER JOIN repositories ON codecoverage.repository_id = repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id = $project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT unittests.time AS "time",
(COALESCE(unittests.gh_action, 0) + COALESCE(unittests.jenkins, 0) + COALESCE(unittests.travis, 0) + COALESCE(unittests.other, 0)) AS "unit-tests",
repositories.name
FROM unittests INNER JOIN repositories ON unittests.repository_id = repositories.id
WHERE repositories.project_id = $project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT unittests.time AS "time",
(COALESCE(unittests.gh_action, 0) + COALESCE(unittests.jenkins, 0) + COALESCE(unittests.travis, 0) + COALESCE(unittests.other, 0)) AS "unit-tests",
repositories.name
FROM unittests INNER JOIN repositories ON unittests.repository_id = repositories.id
WHERE repositories.project_id = $project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  time AS "time",
  resolved AS "Resolved",
  unresolved AS "Unresolved",
  rejected AS "Rejected", 
  todo AS "ToDo", 
  blocked AS "Blocked", 
  in_progress AS "In Progress",
  code_review AS "Code Review",
  on_qa AS "On QA",
  release_pending AS "Release Pending",
  created_last_15d AS "Created in last 15 days", 
  created_last_30d AS "Created in last 30 days",
  todo_older_than_30d AS "ToDo from last 30 days", 
  todo_older_than_60d AS "ToDo from last 60 days"
FROM jira 
WHERE project_id=$project AND type=$issue_type AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT 
  time AS "time",
  resolved AS "Resolved",
  unresolved AS "Unresolved",
  rejected AS "Rejected", 
  todo AS "ToDo", 
  blocked AS "Blocked", 
  in_progress AS "In Progress",
  code_review AS "Code Review",
  on_qa AS "On QA",
  release_pending AS "Release Pending",
  created_last_15d AS "Created in last 15 days", 
  created_last_30d AS "Created in last 30 days",
  todo_older_than_30d AS "ToDo from last 30 days", 
  todo_older_than_60d AS "ToDo from last 60 days"
FROM jira 
WHERE project_id=$project AND type=$issue_type AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT r.title as "Repository Name", sq.sonar_last_analysis as "Last Sonar Analysis"        
FROM (
    SELECT repository_id, MAX(time) AS latest_time
    FROM sonarqube
    GROUP BY repository_id
) AS latest
INNER JOIN sonarqube sq ON latest.repository_id = sq.repository_id AND latest.latest_time = sq.time
INNER JOIN repositories r ON sq.repository_id = r.id
WHERE r.project_id = $project

SELECT sonarqube.time AS "time", sonarqube.security_hotspots, repositories.name
FROM sonarqube INNER JOIN repositories ON sonarqube.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT sonarqube.time AS "time", sonarqube.security_hotspots, repositories.name
FROM sonarqube INNER JOIN repositories ON sonarqube.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT sonarqube.time AS "time", sonarqube.vulnerabilities, repositories.name
FROM sonarqube INNER JOIN repositories ON sonarqube.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT sonarqube.time AS "time", sonarqube.vulnerabilities, repositories.name
FROM sonarqube INNER JOIN repositories ON sonarqube.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT sonarqube.time AS "time", sonarqube.bugs, repositories.name
FROM sonarqube INNER JOIN repositories ON sonarqube.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT sonarqube.time AS "time", sonarqube.bugs, repositories.name
FROM sonarqube INNER JOIN repositories ON sonarqube.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT sonarqube.time AS "time", sonarqube.code_smells, repositories.name
FROM sonarqube INNER JOIN repositories ON sonarqube.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

SELECT sonarqube.time AS "time", sonarqube.code_smells, repositories.name
FROM sonarqube INNER JOIN repositories ON sonarqube.repository_id=repositories.id 
WHERE repositories.project_id=$project AND $__timeFilter("time")
ORDER BY 1

list.definition:
SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value
FROM groups
UNION ALL
SELECT 'All' AS __text, 0 AS __value
ORDER BY __text;
list.label: Project Group
list.name: group
list.query:
SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value
FROM groups
UNION ALL
SELECT 'All' AS __text, 0 AS __value
ORDER BY __text;

list.definition:
SELECT 'All' AS __text, 'All' AS __value
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT 
COALESCE(manager_name, 'Unknown') AS __text, 
COALESCE(manager_name, 'Unknown') AS __value
FROM projects
WHERE 
  CASE
    WHEN $group = 0 THEN true
    ELSE group_id = $group
  END
ORDER BY __text;
list.label: Managers
list.name: manager
list.query:
SELECT 'All' AS __text, 'All' AS __value
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT 
COALESCE(manager_name, 'Unknown') AS __text, 
COALESCE(manager_name, 'Unknown') AS __value
FROM projects
WHERE 
  CASE
    WHEN $group = 0 THEN true
    ELSE group_id = $group
  END
ORDER BY __text;

list.definition:
SELECT title AS __text, id AS __value
FROM projects
WHERE 
  ($group = 0 OR group_id = $group)
  AND
  ('$manager' = 'All' OR COALESCE(manager_name, 'Unknown') = '$manager')
ORDER BY __text;
list.label: Projects
list.name: project
list.query:
SELECT title AS __text, id AS __value
FROM projects
WHERE 
  ($group = 0 OR group_id = $group)
  AND
  ('$manager' = 'All' OR COALESCE(manager_name, 'Unknown') = '$manager')
ORDER BY __text;

list.label: Repository
list.name: repository
list.query: SELECT title FROM repositories WHERE project_id = $project

list.definition: select name from projects where id = '$project'
list.name: plugin_name
list.query: select name from projects where id = '$project'

list.description: Its only applicable for req-portal stats.
list.label: Environment
list.name: env

list.definition:
SELECT
    type AS __value,
    CASE
        WHEN type = 'qe' THEN 'QE Tasks'
        WHEN type = 'dev' THEN 'Development Bugs'
        ELSE type -- for other types, use the type as the text
    END AS __text
FROM jira
WHERE project_id = $project
GROUP BY type;
list.name: issue_type
list.query:
SELECT
    type AS __value,
    CASE
        WHEN type = 'qe' THEN 'QE Tasks'
        WHEN type = 'dev' THEN 'Development Bugs'
        ELSE type -- for other types, use the type as the text
    END AS __text
FROM jira
WHERE project_id = $project
GROUP BY type;
